item.title: Peer Influence for a music-streaming company
item.description: Peer Influence for a music-streaming company # Load relevant packages library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) library(corrplot) library(MatchIt) library(psych) library(GGally) library(gridExtra) #read the dataset High_Note <- read.csv("Data/peer_influence.csv", header = TRUE) describeBy(High_Note, group = High_Note$adopter, mat = FALSE, digits=2) ## ## Descriptive statistics by group ## group: 0 ## vars n mean sd median trimmed ## Ã¯..ID 1 40300 20150.50 11633.75 20150.50 20150.50 ## age 2 40300 23.95 6.37 23.00 23.09 ## male 3 40300 0.
